thread.title: Photographer’s Stunning, Iridescent Business Card Changes Color Constantly
thread.title_full: Photographer’s Stunning, Iridescent Business Card Changes Color Constantly

title: Photographer’s Stunning, Iridescent Business Card Changes Color Constantly
text: Photographer’s Stunning, Iridescent Business Card Changes Color Constantly By Dorothy Tan , 02 Feb 2017 Subscribe to newsletter Like us on Facebook Based in Budapest, Hungary, photographer Al'z Ács has an awesome business card that would make you wish that your own name card is half as cool. Created by Hungarian designer Réka Neszmélyi and featuring a logo by Graz-based creative Ádám Katyi , the card’s simple design shows that you certainly do not need a lot to be going on to make a great impression. The simple layout of the card is paired with the stunning visual effect of reflective foil that covers a significant area—other than this patch of eye-catching metallic foil, you would only find the logo and an email address printed on the surface. Depending on the light and the angle from which you look at it, this gorgeous business card changes color to look new and different, surprising you with the shade that would appear next.
